pkgmetadata.longdescription: Some nice themes for blinkensim. Included are themes of the "Haus des Lehrers" at Alexanderplatz n Berlin. This is the place where the original Blinkenlights installation where set up. Then there are themes of the "Biblioth√®que nationale de France" in Paris where the second installation called "Arcade" took place. Furthermore you can find some experimental themes for LED-clones.
